body:
> Are there common fossil hosting services like GitHub is for Git?

There is e.g. [Chisel](http://chiselapp.com/), but the point with Fossil is that it's kind of [github-in-a-box](http://fossil-scm.org/index.html/doc/trunk/www/fossil-v-git.wiki) so one can use any cheap shared hosting and [host](http://fossil-scm.org/index.html/doc/trunk/www/selfhost.wiki) Fossil repos as long as one can access URL via HTTP(S)/SSH.
